title: MYGA (Make yuumi great again)
body:
W buffs.
Can we make this ability somewhat realistic in terms of lockout/CC?

Lets add this up:
Yuumi gets CCd before attempting a jump to ally.
She is locked out from skill for FIVE (5) Seconds.
Add the duration of CC to this counter: 1-2seconds
That equals a full CC duration of 6-7 seconds.
IMAGINE being CCd on ANY champion for 6-7 seconds!
This is pure insanity. It also forces every Yuumi into a boring playstyle that EVERYONE (Players who like her and hate her) ABSOLUTELY DETEST. NOBODY wants to just.... Sit there and be 1/2 a champion till level 6 and even then, you only become 3/4s a champion.

Her W needs to be brought in line with ALL the rest of the CC in this game:
A CC causes a lockout from W for 1-1.75s for a total duration of 2-3.75s

This will give yuumis in the early game a CHANCE to survive some engagements.

Now, lets talk Q and her base stat growths as well as her passive mechanics.

Yuumis Q was nerfed 40 damage at all ranks. During 10.1, she got 10 damage back at all ranks leaving it a total nerf of -30 all ranks but she has a 1s 60% useless slow.
-Yuumis Q is a laughable, joke of a skill. DO THE RIGHT THING AND REWORK THIS GARBAGE. I get it, its a unique interesting skill- that nobody likes or cares about except the people at Riot game.
If this ability cannot deal damage, it needs to have CC (the reasonable slow 80% for 1s is fine) or, she needs a new Q.

Yuumis passive popnblock is useless past level 3-4 as her stats are pathetic and even ADC in the 10.1 meta can DESTROY her.
Let alone REAL meta picks like Yasuo, Swain, Volibear, Heimerdinger.
Counting CC in teamfights as you do with assassin types is also useless on yuumi as its not the CC that kills her nor even 'burst damage' she can just get killed with 4 autos. LMAO.
REMEMBER! W now has a 0.5s channel time unless you are jumping from ally to ally so you have to CC yourself for .5s PLUS travel time to perform your passive which is 100% unreasonable to do level 9ish and up, even in a teamfight with all skills blown.
The changes to the support items legit makes her passive opressive 3-4 and nearly useless after till 9 when it just flat IS useless.

Cmon riot. Just move on. This was a good idea but its a failure of implementation.

PS: Nerfing how long her Q can travel is not enough to make that skill allowed to have its damage back.
If you want to give it damage, NERF THE PROJECTILE TURNING SPEED.
That is the only way to fix that ability to make it as intended.

-Yuumi lover
